website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful Advent calendar by Melissa & Doug that can be reused year after year.
pros: Contains 24 ornament-shaped magnets and a star for the top of the tree
The wooden calendar is durable and safe for young kids since there are no sharp edges
A box at the bottom of the tree can be used to store the ornaments
cons: The magnets aren't super strong and sometimes fall off

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected from Melissa & Doug
customer_reviews.text: Melissa and Doug used to be quality products. The tree was glued to the base with too much glue, causing it to lean forward, a few of the ornaments are chipped, and this is straight out of the package. There was no damage to the box or anything, so that leads me to believe that M&D's quality control department was on break that day. Definitely not the same quality as the puzzles we've had for 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: csymon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sparkly tree
customer_reviews.text: I have had mixed feelings about Melissa and Doug because when it comes to quality only about half of the stuff I buy from them seems to be any good. I was wary of buying this because of the quality issue I've had in the past. I didn't need to be - this tree is absolutely lovely. The ornaments and tree itself have glitter on them, but it doesn't shed which I appreciate. It is super pretty and a great toy or advent calendar for children. All of my kids (1.5-7) enjoy playing with it and I am considering getting another one for the oldest two to keep in their room.
customer_reviews.author: Noxink

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased this! I'd been searching for a quality advent calendar for a few Christmases to enjoy with my son, who is now 3, that didn't involve chocolate. The types of wooden advent calendars with the small wooden boxes or drawers are expensive! So this is a great price, made of wood also and helps your child with counting the days and deciding which ornament to place on the tree each night. We're a busy family, so I wanted an activity that can be quick but still mark the days, and this is definitely it. I could see this being enjoyed by our family for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Alb

customer_reviews.title: Some Improvements Needed, but Nice Overall
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this, but the back is not very nice looking...it's more like a Melissa and Doug advertisement (looks like packaging). Also, it would be nice if the bottom had a way to fold up so that this could be stored flat. Would probably give 4 or 5 stars if the back and base were improved.
customer_reviews.author: MPW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adults too!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad there was a review from an adult buying this for themselves. All the reviews were for very small kids but there is definitely no age limit as I have college kids loving it :)))) It’s exactly what I was looking for. I saw the adult review saying she loved it and that made me buy it. It’s a magnetic tree that you stick magnet Christmas ornaments on every time a day passes. It’s fun for kids but, it’s also fun for adults who don’t want to open something everyday but still be able to have an advent calendar. Perfect for all ages !!!!!! It’s cute so too 😁
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Loved how it looked with my other decorations in my office. Very sturdy and strong magnets. I've only used it for one Christmas but I can definitely say it is something I look forward to using again. The pieces are colorful and I love how there's no right or wrong way to do it. I like starting from the bottom but this year I might go from the top. I love how it brightens my office space and placing an ornament at the end of the work day is sl much fun. This not only appeals to children but also adults. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Lots of Replay Value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my three-year old niece. She loved it. She's just starting to understand the concept of time and this worked well to show the passage of days until Christmas. Unlike regular advent calendars, this one is made for play. It also has a lot of replay value because the wooden, magnetic "ornaments" can be placed on any date on the tree. My niece enjoyed decorating and undecorating the tree over and over. The decorations are a nice size for little hands and the attached wooden tray at the bottom of the tree is generously sized to hold all of the ornaments plus the star. I know she'll enjoy this advent calendar for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Coresten

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, quality is solid. No peeling or other issues as some have described. My 4-year old has rearranged the ornaments five or six times a day (it’s still November) and absolutely loves it. She can’t wait to start counting down to Santa.
customer_reviews.author: motodoc817

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love Melissa & Doug though?
customer_reviews.text: Unless you've been living under a rock, M&D have amazing products. I was looking for an Advent calendar that didn't have candy, would last longer than 24 days, and was still kid friendly. Bam, M&D for the win as always. Great coloring, easy to use magnets and cost friendly should anything get damaged with kiddies hands. I hate to pack it up but it's time. I am glad that i will have this instead of chocolate next year, though my kid might miss the chocolate, she loved this and couldn't wait to get up and add the ornament every day.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Kays

customer_reviews.title: This is not the Advent you are looking for
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made cardboard. Several pieces were delaminating when we opened it from it's plastic wrap which offered no protection and left several marks on the product. Save your money and buy something that will last more than one Christmas's and not look like you cut it out of a cereal box. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Big_Chungus

customer_reviews.title: and we wanted something non-messy and sturdy that she could interact with but that would still ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for... our 14 month old is still too little for the chocolate advent calendars, and we wanted something non-messy and sturdy that she could interact with but that would still be fun for years to come. This "calendar" is high quality and simple but still fun and attractive. She likes to take all the ornaments off every morning, which is fine, we just put up different ones up every day.... we're all enjoying it and looking forward to doing it again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Sizzle Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Description was accurate and this is the perfect little intruduction to advent calendars for a 4-5 year old. It's sturdy so I don't need to worry about kids breaking it, but it is still good for teaching kids a lesson in respect for decorations and how some decorations can be played with and some can't. This little tree is fun because none of the magnetic "ornaments" have numbers so it doesn't matter which ones you put up for each day and they can all be rearranged in any configuration.
customer_reviews.author: ChloKins

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this! He likes being about to put an ornament on the tree each day. He likes that he can pick out a different looking ornament as well! I was afraid that the tree and container would break easily but it’s pretty strong. I was also worried that the magnets would be too small and a Viking hazard. They are a good size and I don’t worry about him choking on them. They magnets are also high quality and stick really well to the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah DeLaurier

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well to rough handling
customer_reviews.text: I love the Melissa and Doug Christmas countdown advent! I purchased it for my nine year old daughter who has Down Syndrome. She loves it too! It has held up to her rough play. I had it on display during the month of December so that my daughter could countdown to Christmas. My daughter played with it everyday. Also my two youngest granddaughters, who are 3 and 4 years old, loved playing with it too! I purchased this item during Amazon’s deal of the day for only $10!
customer_reviews.author: Estherna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect advent calendar for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I love just about anything Melissa & Doug anyways, and this is no exception. Everything is made of quality wood, not cheap materials. It will stand up to little ones being typical kids with it. The tray in the bottom holds everything well. My girls are 3 and 5, and they love taking turns putting an ornament on the tree each day. This is the best way to count down to Christmas without adding 5 million tiny toy parts to our toy bin like other advent calendars. We can reuse this from year to year and then hand it off to other kids. Perfect! And the price was the best part.
customer_reviews.author: xstarfirex08

customer_reviews.title: Christmas countdown for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This was perfect! I purchased this as a deal of the day for my nephew who is 3 years old. This is age appropriate for him. I wanted him to be able to count down to Christmas and this is perfect. It’s a good size and when he opened it he was excited and knew what it was. I love that the holder for the additional discs is at the bottom of the tree. It keeps everything together. Easy clean up, sturdy product and super happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: R. Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Great Allergen Friendly Advent Calendar!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a whole plethora of allergies, but I still really wanted to get him an advent calendar last year. This tree totally saved the day! Not only is it allergen friendly (he chewed on the ornaments to make sure!) but it can also be a lasting keepsake that we bring out every year. The magnets work great even after being played with by a 1.5 year old, and the little box at the bottom of the tree makes it super easy to clean everything up. The colors are bright and eye catching too. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Morgin

customer_reviews.title: An advent calendar meant to last
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is very nice. The quality and attention to detail is apparent. We will use this every year. My kids love putting choosing which piece will go up next, and picking the pieces out of the box. It would be nice if there was a better place to store the pieces for the rest of the year. The box at the bottom does not detach or have a lid so I was very careful packing it away. We put all the pieces in a ziplock bag so they wouldn't get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Very durable fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for little hands! My grandkids love it, particularly my 2-year old granddaughter who is fascinated with magnets. It’s made of bright-colored quality materials and just really cute. The built-in box under the tree acts as both a storage place and a sturdy stand. It is something that will be used for years - one of those decoration traditions that you look forward to bringing out every year - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laura DeYoung

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the most adorable Advent tree I’ve ever seen. Truth be told, my two year old granddaughter is far too young to understand or even be patient with the adding of one ornament a day for Advent. Instead, she counted, sorted, decorated and redecorated this tree several times a day throughout the Christmas season! It definitely has been a big hit and something she likely will enjoy for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Frances

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I have four boys, ages 8, 6, 4, and 1. They have loved using this calendar this month. I wanted an advent calendar that didn’t have candy in it every day because of all of the other treats and candies that come with this month, and they get so excited each morning about taking off another magnet. It’s nice and sturdy. We keep it on top of the piano where everyone can see it and the baby can’t take ALL of the magnets. They take turns each day of who gets to remove it. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Count from the bottom, not the top...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand kids and they loved it. The only problem that I had, was convincing my four-year-old grandson, that you start from the bottom and work your way up on the tree. He wasn't buying that... Maybe next year I'll be able to get him to understand better. Then again, what does it really matter, as long as they're having a great Christmas?
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Moss

customer_reviews.title: Bent But Still Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and would have given it 5 stars but when it arrived the plastic that it’s wrapped in was so tight that it caused the tree itself to bend forward quite a bit. Hopefully this only happened to mine because otherwise it’s a beautiful calendar and my daughter loves to place the ornaments on it. The ornaments are lovely and I love how there is a box at the base of the tree to hold them. The whole thing is quite sturdy and after a year in storage there is no warping or peeling. Just wish it would sit up straight.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves magnets and is excited to countdown Christmas. I gave this review 5 stars, but our tree does not sit in the base very well. It’s not super sturdy. Nothing we couldn’t solve with some wood glue. I love M&D products, but I’ve had issues with most of my items I’ve purchased on amazon. We bought it on a lightning deal for less than $10, so for the price we paid, definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Countdown!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something like this... Growing up we had an advent calendar that we got out each year. We'd take turns putting up a piece and I loved it. I really wish I could have that one... but alas, my mom isn't giving it up... So when I found this I was really excited! My girls loved taking turns putting up an ornament each day as we counted down to Christmas. My only complaint is that it seems you have to have the ornament on the circle "just so" or the magnet won't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Jillene A.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: I bot one for myself last year. I liked it so much I bot one each this year for my mom and sister. What do you mean great for ages 4-7? We're 63, 66 and 88 and we love using them! And the grandkids come over and love to move the ornaments around. It's pretty to look at and it's fun to use. The magnets aren't too strong but they easily hold in place. Great price; well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun little advent calendar! My two year old loves this! Such a cute way to count down without candy and cheap cardboard. Only downside is Melissa and Doug tots have tendency to peel or chip. I’ve had this maybe two weeks and I’ve noticed some small spots where the green tree is peeling from the backing, but I have a two year old. She is hard on stuff. Still totally worth it in my mind!
customer_reviews.author: Steal362

customer_reviews.title: Excellent holiday product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent holiday product!I think over the past few years I’ve purchased 10 of these from various people. I’ve gifted them to families to use for countdown till Christmas. It’s a very durable and fun colorful product. Melissa and Doug make quality materials. This comes with everything you need, even a magnet holding box built into the Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Koren Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Special, long lasting Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: Love this Advent calendar! Great quality. Since it's not December yet, my 3 year old has actually been using it as a puzzle, which had been very fun for her. My only concern is how to store this all year...might have to get creative with putting the magnets in a bag and taping it on the back or something. But even with the storage hiccup, I still recommend this and give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TRA

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this countdown calendar this past Christmas. It's a great alternative to giving your kids candy every day of December. The whole thing is constructed well of sturdy material. The magnets don't look like magnets yet they stick well. They are all decorated differently and very, very cute. It's not tiny, nor big. I just wish it came with a couple extra ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Dominique Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Cute countdown for kids
customer_reviews.text: I really was excited to get this countdown for my 5 year old son since he is learning to count at school and recognize numbers. This also helped with how many days until Christmas so he didn't need to ask everyday. However, the down side of this tree was the magnets are not that strong. Especially the star would always slide down. But for the most part it's a good size for a house or apartment, easy to stay organized with the magnets since there is a small area to keep them. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ealy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Enough For Toddlers, Presentable Enough For Adults
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little countdown calendar. The toddlers play with it and enjoy putting the little ornaments on the tree and taking them off. It's been bumped and knocked over several times, but is still in one piece. It's fairly sturdy, and the base is big enough that it doesn't just "fall over" at the slightest touch. Overall, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke Lark

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but magnets seem weak
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute, my kids will have fun counting down until Christmas with it. I am worried about the durability of the magnets. They don't seem super strong, so I'm worried how many years they will last with little kids playing with it, which is what it was designed for. I'm keeping my fingers crossed the magnets hold up more than a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: rate

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 & 6 year olds loved this! The magnets stick to the tree but like other reviewers had said wish the base of it or the red box part was made a little better or wish it stored the ornaments different. Our red box base part broke the 2nd day even with help from super glue it’s not gonna last long but love how they interact & countdown to Christmas & Jesus’s birthday each day! We will at least be able to save the tree & ornament magnets to continue using each year just not sure about the red box base part. Still glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly poor quality for Melissa & Doug
customer_reviews.text: Normally we really like Melissa & Doug's toys, however this one really miss the mark. The idea is geat but the tree does not sit at a 90-degree angle to your table but leans awkwardly forwords. The decorative paper/layer on the back and front are not well glued and starting to peel, as well as the front decorative paper/layer is starting to chip already on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It is ok. Not the standard for M and D
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited tiger this I paid extra for shipping. But... Melissa and Doug typically have great quality and we love their products, thus I chose this advent calendar. However , the magnets slip. I have moved the star several times and it relocates on its own. In addition, when it was put together it was put together with too much glue causing it to lean forward. I wanted this to be something we keep forever , but I am not quite sure this is a piece that make the cut Year after year.
customer_reviews.author: TEH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing way to count down to Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fun way to help my 2 1/2 year old daughter understand when Christmas was going to be here and also introduce a fun routine into the holiday season. This countdown tree was perfect. Each ornament is uniquely painted, making the selection of the day’s ornament exciting for her. The ornaments are lightweight but well made. The magnets and metal surface are not obvious at all, it just looks like a wooden decoration. The magnets are strong enough to make the ornaments adhere, but not so strong that they can’t be easy moved. This is a winner and will be a tradition for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Okay.. if you don't have one of these, you should get one! Enjoyable for every child! My kids 3, 6 & 12 had fun picking out their favorite ornament to add to the tree during count down til Christmas. But when we first got this, they had fun placing ornaments the way they wanted. Seemed to be a fun thing for them to do while eating breakfast. Has a cute saying on the back as well. Definitely, an awesome 'counter downer', as my lil one calls it!
customer_reviews.author: samspoofyorganics

customer_reviews.title: Quality is lacking --
customer_reviews.text: It used to be that you could count on Melissa and Doug products to be well made, but the quality of their products seems top be slipping. This is the most recent example for us. An excessive amount of adhesive was used to attach the tree to the tray and there is a fair amount of glue in the tray as a result. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bandl

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea, nice color scheme
customer_reviews.text: I sure hope we never lose the magnetic ornaments ... there aren’t any extra! Each ornament is a different design and that was fun for my preschooler. This didn’t get a lot of heavy play, but it still looked new when I put it away at the end of the month. There’s no great storage for it after Christmas is over- it’s a little bulky and the magnets are just loose in compartment. A lid/drawer on base would improve this.
customer_reviews.author: bld424

customer_reviews.title: It's cute and seems like it's worth $11.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this after reading the negative reviews but it was $11 and for a home daycare so I thought I'd give it a try. I've wasted $11 before. I'm glad I bought it. I don't have the glue clump, bad magnets or peeling paper. The magnets aren't the strongest but I did put all of them on and dropped the tree just a couple inches. They stayed in place. The back is ugly with advertising. That poem is on there but gets lost in the mess. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Great new tradition to start
customer_reviews.text: I love this tree! I have toddler twins and was looking to start a new tradition with an advent calendar countdown and decided on this one - it's simple, sweet, visually eye catching, simple and fun pieces for my almost 3 year olds - no worries about breakage, etc and unlike others, it won't teach my Littles to look for a little gift every day during the countdown! Especially for the price, I'm completely pleased with the quality and the product! Can't go wrong with Melissa and Doug!
customer_reviews.author: amk

customer_reviews.title: This was a hit
customer_reviews.text: We used this throughout the Christmas month and it was really cute! Not only did i think it looked cute, like a Christmas decoration but it was cute to see my kids wake up every morning and run to it to decorate it with 1 more ornament! We usually buy the candy advent calendar but with 3 kids it felt like it was getting pricey, with advent calendars running 10$ . I can use this over and over so i am so glad i got this!
customer_reviews.author: Courtlyn9450

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the big countdown!
customer_reviews.text: Tree is a nice size. Ornaments are beautifully decorated. Excellent quality as are all of Melissa and Doug's items. Not cheaply made at all. Poem is on back. Paint is eye-catching. I am a preschool teacher for 30 years and am happy to use this with my class. Kids love it. I am sure it will be in use long after I retire!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest things ever!!! I have two grandchildren that were three years old when I bought these they just put the decorations on took the decorations off read decorated the tree it will become just a family decoration but a great advent calendar when they are older this is precious I would highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Sally A Greathouse

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids! Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love anything Melissa & Doug! They always make quality products and i love the wood over plastic for their toys! This is just perfect for my family! I love chocolate calendars, but this is better and i dont have to waste $20+ dollars every year for chocolate. And my daughter loves adding the ornaments!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional, possibly not that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved doing the advent calendar this year! Every morning my kids would rush to it to pick out the day’s ornament. We purchased this and used it for the month of December and it was never picked up or handled beyond placing the magnetic ornaments on it and I noticed as I was putting it away that the front design was peeling away in places along the edges, I’m still hopeful it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Veggi Jessi

customer_reviews.title: The Percect Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun!!!! My kids have a blast every morning putting a magnet organment on the tree and it’s such a great alternative to candy advent calendars. The tree is like a giant magnet and there are 24 ornament-shaped dates to count down the days until Christmas. The magnets stay on great and there’s even a tray at the bottom of the tree to hold all of the pieces. Awesome toy and decoration!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Product, Minor Issues
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this advent calander. Its very cute, simple to use, and fun for the kids. The biggest flaw it the magnetic pull is not very strong. We found if it was bumped the ornaments came off. I wish the bottom was a drawer or it had a lid of some type. The ornaments are very easy to lose. Overall, I like it and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyO

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old to do everyday. He absolutely loved it! He looked forward to putting the magnets on the tree everyday. Great alternative for an advent calendar with no small pieces. Now that Christmas is over and I’ve put it away, it’s awkward to store because of the tray on the bottom. I still love it and will use it for my kids next year too!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Fun Holiday Tradition for Children
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fun toy for our 12 month old to play with this holiday season. The ornaments are magnetic and she has enjoyed sticking them to the tree and removing them. Once removed they can be stored in the red base, it's an open-top "box." It can be used as a traditional advent and we played a few games including sorting by color and counting. I also loved that it looks nice sitting out. :)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy. Magnets work well and do not easily fall off. The red box below is fantastic to store the ornaments taken off. My daughter loved it and it was a great visual to countdown for Santa and baby Jesus. My 4 year old enjoyed it yet my 2 year old nephew wasn't quite interested yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mills

customer_reviews.title: Cute way to count down to christmas day!
customer_reviews.text: We just got our count down tree today. My kids, ages 9 and 4, are so excited about it already. They have been decorating and redecorating it over and over already. They can not wait until December 1st to start the count down! It seems really well made and all the ornaments have fun different designs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Christmas countdown for our kids (6, 4 and 2). This works GREAT! very nice quality and the kids love it as they played with it for a little while now enjoy taking turns putting the magnetic ornament on each day. Even has helped our little one with counting his numbers too!
customer_reviews.author: Oilshealthymama

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this- it’s been a tradition for a few years now to use it. I wish you could order just the magnet ornaments because sometimes they get lost. I had to replace the whole thing because of this. This would make a great family gift for friends or cousins when you can’t think of anything.
customer_reviews.author: Candys Bogner

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The designs on the bulbs are cardboard glued to magnets. As I unwrapped them, at least 10 of the cardboard pieces came off. Including the star. Super cute but I'll be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Hands On Kids’ Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this advent tree on sale AFTER Christmas to have for my grandkids next year. Before I could get it and my decorations stored away, my 3 year old granddaughter found it and just had to play with it. Melissa & Doug usual high quality. Ornaments are all decorated differently in bright colors and cute characters. Magnets are incorporated into the ornaments, so no small pieces to worry about with small kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jill E. Haught

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this deal on Erica's Steals and Finds page on FB and knew my kids would love it! Great quality and the kids love counting down to Christmas! I will say though, my 9 year old was disappointed that she doesn't get chocolate out of it daily because she is used to the chocolate advent calenders!
customer_reviews.author: Tank

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Our 2.5 year old loves this tree and names off the numbers as she decorates it, her favorite part is the “on top star” and I love that it’s something that can grow with her as she learns to count down to the holiday. I could even see it becoming a decoration when she put grows it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: We are having fun with this product.... It's OK but it could be a lot better. We are using the ornaments from the top, going 1-24, following along with the actual dates. For the price, and since it'll only be used 1 month out of the year, it sure would have been nice if the storage bin for the ornaments had a lid. Also, the magnets are not very strong so if you bump it ever so slightly the star or an ornament or two will fall off. I would pay more for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Crayon

customer_reviews.title: A Fun New Tradition
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves putting the new ornament on the tree each day. Can't wait for tomorrow when she finally gets to put the star at the top. She is only two so we keep it on an out of reach shelf so she's supervised every time. Looking forward to bringing it out again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest thing you will ever buy. I got this not only for my toddlers but for decoration as well and even for an adult it as fun. I was just as excited as my children to receive this and put the magnetic circles on each spot on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: NO CHOCOLATE MESS
customer_reviews.text: Normally you have chocolate pieces behind each date which leads to arguments over the chocolate and even a gooey calendar. This tree eliminates those problems, is re-usable, and still helps with the anticipation of Christmas. I find that a definite WIN!
customer_reviews.author: E. Resser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is awesome! While candy or toy advent calendars are always very fun - they can get expensive. I was happy to purchase this and find that the quality is really well and can last for many years to come and we won't have to spend lots of money on advent calendars going forward. Christmas Day is the star at the top of the tree - SO CUTE.
customer_reviews.author: Rector

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute enough.
customer_reviews.text: It could be better but it’s really cute and it’ll last season to season. It’s not a staple toy for Melissa and Doug so they didn’t invest a ton into it. The counters are magnets so not meant for kids to be alone with if they still put stuff in their mouth or any kid 3 and under.
customer_reviews.author: FrickandMab

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable advent calendar/Xmas countdown alternative to the candy ones
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this advent tree. I thought it was the perfect option for a toddler, that can be used year after year. My almost 2 year old likes to put the ornament magnets on the tree. It’s just the right size for him, and seems sturdy that it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Good for older kids too!
customer_reviews.text: I know this is directed towards younger kids but I've been looking for an advent calendar that didn't have a gift every day and wasn't felt. It arrived today, it's really cute and seems well made, my 10 year old is looking forward to counting down with this!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Atteberry

customer_reviews.title: Cute - no box, pieces could easily be lost.
customer_reviews.text: Cute countdown calendar. I’m using it to help my 4 year old with her numbers. It would be nice if the ornaments had matching numbers on the back. I was disappointed that the tree did not come in a box, which will make it difficult for storage for future years.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy4mykids

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to work on counting!
customer_reviews.text: I love that we have an Advent calendar that doesn't require candy or small toys that will be stepped on or lost in the couch cushions. My 2-year-old picked an ornament every morning from the little basket at the base, and then we counted all the "hanging" ornaments after we put the day's ornament up. Great learning tool!
customer_reviews.author: E. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with my 5 year old granddaughter! Fun way to count down the days till Christmas, then Santa placed the star on top. Great quality and vibrant colors. Melissa & Doug products never disappoint, and they are 100% Made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Annette

customer_reviews.title: Best Advent Calendar I've Seen
customer_reviews.text: I am SO GLAD I decided to purchase this. It's the quality product you would expect in Melissa and Doug products. My kids seem to like to count down to Christmas better on this than on their Chocolate Advent calednars. They LOVE that they can sift through the ornaments to pick the one they want on that day. I love that the base of the tree simultaneously holds the tree securely upright while keeping all the ornaments in one place. IT's in front of the tree but you barely notice it. This is going to bring joy for YEARS to come!
customer_reviews.author: digginitez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This tree was the perfect advent calendar for my almost 4 year old and his 20 month old siblings. The magnets work well, and this thing is durable and can take toddler abuse. It's been so fun counting down the days until Christmas. The ornaments are such cute designs and seem very high quality (pretty typical for Melissa and Doug products!)
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have always bought each of our girls their own toy advent calendars (they are 5 & 7) but this year I wanted to focus less on the daily gifts, however wanted a count down. This was perfect! We delivered it as a gift from our Elf on the Shelf and it worked perfectly.. they looked forward to adding an ornament each morning and I love that we can bring it back each year. It’s just gorgeous and well made
customer_reviews.author: AvP28

customer_reviews.title: New Christmas tradition!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this and love it. It’s a good size, bright and cheerful piece. It came well packaged and is great quality for the price. My three year old took to it immediately and loves putting the ornaments on the tree. I think this is a nice piece we can use again and again, much better than the disposable chocolate advent calendars, which you need one for each child. I like that it helps my kids learn counting and numbers too.
customer_reviews.author: 123kate

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Well not sure it'll actually be used as an advent calendar but my almost 2 year old loves putting them on and off. So cute I just hope we don't lose any ornaments because it's awesome. But at least he can play with that and maybe leave the big tree alone???
customer_reviews.author: Peter & Fran

customer_reviews.title: For kids 1-101
customer_reviews.text: This Advent calendar is so colorful and unique! I bought it for my mother who has dementia, for her to keep track of the days until Christmas, but we all loved it! The handy tray that holds all the magnets keeps them all together! I plan on buying one for each of my kids households next year, that’s how much we enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Fun simple countdown
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun and simple countdown! My kids loved taking turns picking out an ornament each day to add to the tree. We didn’t have any problems with it tipping over. It held up with three kids playing with it and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Countdown
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old grandson loved using this during the Christmas season. In addition to the fun he had choosing which ornament to use each day, it was a great visual for him to help him see how many more days he had to wait until Christmas morning. Both the tree and ornaments are bright, sturdy, and well made. I know he'll enjoy it again next year, and his baby sister after him. I have no doubt it will last.
customer_reviews.author: PJKuz

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for each of my neices & nephews so they could each have their own tree. Wasnt durable enough for 2 year old torment. Base box broke. But was still beautiful and fun. I also used it for my own tree and would change around ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: Julie T

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Fun: Melissa and Doug have done it again!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift! First, it is very large and sturdy! The tray below is perfect for keeping the ornaments when not in use. The ornaments stick very easily to the board, and they do not easily fall off. My daughter was playing with this a few days after I put it on her table. I actually bought it for a counting activity more so than Advent Calendar. I think it is the perfect calendar too because you can reuse year after year. I have seen it a little cheaper at TJ Maxx. but I wanted to get it before it sold out!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: loved this, so great for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this(3 years old, almost 4. Everyday he would ask "alexa" how many days until Christmas and put on the ornament on the tree. It's very cute. I do agree with someone else's review that I wish there was a cover to be able to store the magnets when putting it away. I'll just use a Ziploc bag to not lose anything.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M. Rebelo

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old niece loves this! any kid that is big into magnets or stickers will love it as well, the only downside is making sure it is either out of their reach when it isn't time to count down or keep a real good eye on how many ornaments are left in the tray after they play with it :) Since its wooden it should last for years which is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Denise H

customer_reviews.title: Great value for quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! It’s a perfect display and easy for my boys to place markers each day. The magnets are strong enough to hold tight to the tree without a lot of bulk/weight. Perfect addition to our Christmas decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessmoe23

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Broken upon arrival and couldn't return because it was the end of November!! Used wood glue to fix where the front red box was damaged. If it hadn't been damaged would've given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: GPope

customer_reviews.title: Special and pretty christmas toy.
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers absolutely love this calendar xmass toy. They love putting on the ornaments and the yellow star over and over again - and there is a little tray to put the ornaments in as well. Brightly colored well-made and sturdy. This is something that we will bring out every Christmas for the next couple of years for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Erin A. Pile

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it, wish it was more durable....
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is adorable and just the right size for my 1 and 3 year old. They were both excited to open it. I'm unfortunately disappointed in the product construction and a little surprised because it's a quality brand. While it's held up for the first couple of weeks, it's obvious that it was not built for durability and I'm certain the graphics will start to peel off with continued use. Additionally, the magnets are not very strong and fall off very easily and slide down the tree if nudged by little fingers. Hopefully it will last a few years at least. There really isn't anything else similar to this out there.
customer_reviews.author: meezee

customer_reviews.title: Cute advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: Fun way for the kids to count down or up til Christmas. Even my 6th grader got into putting the magnetic ornaments on each morning. Good quality, fair price, typically Melissa and Doug product. Definitely a good advent calendar for all ages. Will be a good hand down to grandchildren one day.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Cute countdown!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fun Christmas countdown method! My daughter is 7 and she loves it! Each ornament is different and festive! I like that it's a countdown and not an advent calendar, as Christmas is already enough about gifts and treats and they don't need more. I also love that it's reusable. The only negative I have, this 4 stars instead of 5, is that the green of the tree is paper and can peel. Our tree is peeling in the corner a little bit already. Probably because my younger son enjoys playing with it and putting the ornaments off and on.
customer_reviews.author: CMorley

customer_reviews.title: perfect advent calendar for little ones
customer_reviews.text: my 3 yo daughter really enjoyed this advent calendar. it made it easy to explain to her how many days til christmas and she liked rearranging the “ordamints” daily! she now asks if we can pull it out for every holiday to do a count down!
customer_reviews.author: scarlet begonia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: I think this is such a cute item for my little ones. I have a 1.5 and 3.5 year old and while the little one doesn’t understand it but thinks it’s awesome that you can “decorate” the tree, my oldest looks at the tree instead of asking me how much longer until Christmas. And as always the Melissa and Doug brand is amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaoftwobeauties

customer_reviews.title: Great for littles
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old is loving this advent tree! She enjoys putting all of the magnets on and then taking them off. She certainly ou doesn’t understand the concept, but enjoys it none the less. I do wish it was less tippy or even able to be hung.
customer_reviews.author: chp815

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I got this of my preschool class. My almost 7 year old daughter saw it first. It's been in her room every since. She loves coming out every single day to show up we are one number closer to Christmas. Guess I will have to wait until next year to bring it to the preschool and let them play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Cute, well made. I think this should last a few years while my daughter grows. She’s 16 months right now and loves to pick up the ornaments and place over the numbers. Nice and festive fine motor skill drill.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G

customer_reviews.title: A new tradition!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished using this today (Christmas day) and we really enjoyed it! I love how kid friendly it is yet not too childish looking. I also LOOOVVVEEE that it doesn't involve giving my kids candy every day and they can still know how many days are left until Christmas. I really look forward to using this every year from here on out. Thank you for such a beautiful sturdy product!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4Est2009

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tree ❤
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today. We bought 1 for us and 1 for a gift. Super excited. Looks great. Tree is sturdy on the base which was a possible concern i had when ordering. Oranaments are about silver dollar size.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Kid-friendly and cute
customer_reviews.text: My almost-4-year-old loves adding an ornament to her tree every day as we count down to Christmas. The strength of the magnets is enough that the ornaments stay in place well, but not so strong that my daughter has a difficult time removing or repositioning them. The colors are vibrant and there is a lot of variety in the designs on the ornaments. It’s definitely not an eyesore as some children’s toys are.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen T Bodine

customer_reviews.title: Great for any age!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed my advent calendar tradition as a kid and wanted one I could reuse for my toddler. She's 2 this Christmas and absolutely loves her "tree puzzle." She doesn't understand the concept of time or calendars (I loathe her for that) but this was easy for her to play with and decorate for fun. This is a beautiful piece I kept out all month and she revisited many times!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: New favorite Christmas item!
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful, there’s glitter on the tree that adds sparkle, and the colors are bright! My son loves it! Such a cute thing I will use even when the kids get older! I debated buying this and then a friend posted about it online. I should of bought it sooner! Melissa and Doug never disappoint me with the quality of their toys.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Sippel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy magnetic tree advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: Cute magnetic advent calendar in the shape of a Xmas tree. You put the ornaments on each day in December until the 25th. Nicely constructed and colorful. Melissa & Doug stuff is always great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Great activity
customer_reviews.text: At almost 2, my son had so much fun playing with this tree this year. In years to come we will use it as an advent calendar but this year he really just enjoyed decorating the tree!
customer_reviews.author: Cmt5070

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Countdown to Christmas Wooden Advent Calendar
product_meta.description:
Add some kid-friendly holiday cheer and a charming yuletide ritual to your home with this wooden magnetic holiday tree! The set includes 24 magnetic ornaments plus a shining star for Christmas day-all of which fit neatly in the attached box at the base of the tree. Kids can pick a favorite design to place on the tree each day, following the numbered outlines to fill the tree right up to Christmas. They'll also love to switch, move, and rearrange the pieces to customize their very own tree countless times. Decorating your Countdown to Christmas Wooden Advent Calendar will not only become a highly-anticipated annual tradition, it can also be a great way to help promote and reinforce many developmental skills as children grow. Use the numbers on the tree to help young children with number recognition and to learn to count both forwards and backwards; as they get older, ask children to add the numbers in a row. Play games with the ornaments to help develop color recognition and memory skills. For example, have kids find all of the ornaments that have red but no green or name all of the colors on individual ornaments. Or, ask them to choose five ornaments and study them carefully; then, have them to close their eyes while you remove one ornament. Can they guess which one is missing? The learning possibilities are endless! For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” Today, Melissa & Doug is proudly partnering with the American Academy of Pediatrics to foster early brain development and help children build important life skills through play.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: A FULL CHRISTMAS ORNAMENT SET: This Christmas countdown tree ornament set includes a magnetic wooden tree, 24 magnetic ornaments, and 1 shining star for the top of the tree. An attached wooden ornament box helps to keep all the pieces together.
HANDS-ON WAY TO INTRODUCE CHRISTMAS: The Melissa & Doug Countdown to Christmas Wooden Advent Calendar is an educational and entertaining way to get kids into the Christmas spirit.
INCLUDES AN INSPIRING POEM: The Melissa & Doug Christmas advent calendar includes a holiday poem on the back which encourages family communication and can be part of a festive read-aloud ritual.

GIFT FOR AGES 3 TO 7: Our Countdown to Christmas Wooden Advent Calendar makes a great gift for kids ages 3 to 7 years. Add the Melissa & Doug Wooden Christmas Nativity Set as an ideal accompaniment for festive fun.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News calls “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We design every toy to the highest-quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
